name: Palindrome Permutation
title: Palindrome Permutation
content:
Given a string s, return true if a permutation of the string could form a palindrome and false otherwise.

 

Example 1:

Input: s = "code"
Output: false

Example 2:

Input: s = "aab"
Output: true

Example 3:

Input: s = "carerac"
Output: true

 

Constraints:

  • 1 <= s.length <= 5000
  • s consists of only lowercase English letters.

discussion_posts.name: mkprajapati1614
discussion_posts.content:
I late realized that, by "a permutation of the string could form a palindrome" it means to say 
"by rearranging the given set of characters in any order, it should be able to form a palindrome"

For Example: 
(i) "code" can be transformed into "odce", "doce", "ecod" etc but none of them makes a palindrome
(ii) "aabab" can be transformed into "aaabb", "ababa", "bbaaa" etc, where "ababa" makes a palindrome

discussion_posts.name: YusenPeng
discussion_posts.content: Hint: try to think about the frequency of each letter. What if all characters appear with even times? What if some characters appear with odd times? :)

discussion_posts.name: no-neet-code
discussion_posts.content: You should clarify what permutation of the string means in the description.

discussion_posts.name: AlecLC
discussion_posts.content: # Hint\n\nEvery letter in the word must be matched, except for possibly the middle one

discussion_posts.name: Asyncy99
discussion_posts.content:
A string can form a palindrome if, at most, one character has an odd frequency. In other words:

For even-length palindromes, every character must appear an even number of times.
For odd-length palindromes, all characters except one must have even counts (and that one can appear an odd number of times).

discussion_posts.name: Satansoft
discussion_posts.content: Palindrome is possible when and only when no more than one letter has an odd count.

discussion_posts.name: matthewjinmp
discussion_posts.content: if there is more than 1 letter with an odd count, then a palindrome cannot be formed. otherwise, it can be formed

discussion_posts.name: den1732
discussion_posts.content: A poorly worded task that wastes your time deserves to be called out and this person must be banned
